page.description: Create a new user group in the currently connected database or server.
page.prototype: Result_Flag as L = CreateUserGroup(GroupName as C)

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: GroupName
argument.description: The name of the group to which to add the user.

page.discussion: The AddUserGroup() method creates a new user group in the currently connected database or server.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='SQLServer', Server='doc3000', Trusted_connection=yes, Database='Northwind'}" if .not. conn.open(connString) ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end end if if .not. conn.AddUserGroup("Techwriting") ui_msg_box("Error", conn.CallResult.text) end if conn.close()
